hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT chain FROM ActionChain chain WHERE chain.id = :id AND chain.user = :user AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT entry FROM chain.entries entry JOIN ServerAction action ON entry.action.id = action.parentAction.id)

SELECT chain FROM ActionChain chain WHERE chain.label = :label AND chain.user = :user AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT entry FROM chain.entries entry JOIN ServerAction action ON entry.action.id = action.parentAction.id)

SELECT chain FROM ActionChain chain WHERE chain.user = :user AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT entry FROM chain.entries entry JOIN ServerAction action ON entry.action.id = action.parentAction.id) ORDER BY chain.label ASC

SELECT chain FROM ActionChain chain WHERE chain.user = :user AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT entry FROM chain.entries entry JOIN ServerAction action ON entry.action.id = action.parentAction.id) ORDER BY chain.modified DESC
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(entry.sortOrder) + 1, 0) FROM ActionChainEntry entry WHERE entry.actionChain.id = :id

SELECT count(*) FROM com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.Server s, com.redhat.rhn.domain.action.ActionChainEntry ace, com.redhat.rhn.domain.action.ActionChain ac, com.redhat.rhn.domain.action.Action a, com.redhat.rhn.domain.action.server.ServerAction sa, com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.MinionServer mi WHERE ac.id = :actionchain_id AND ac.id = ace.actionChain.id AND a.id = ace.action.id AND a.id = sa.parentAction.id AND sa.server.id = s.id AND sa.server.id = mi.id
